definitions.definition: A protective system in automobiles in which when a crash occurs, a bag containing nitrogen , formed by the explosive decomposition of sodium azide , quickly inflates in front of the driver or passenger , preventing injury to the head. Side air bags, including the back seat passengers, also prevent injury.
A similar inflated bag used in performing stunts , etc.
A person who talks too much; a windbag or gossip .

main_definition: ( automotive ) A protective system in automobiles in which when a crash occurs, a bag containing nitrogen , formed by the explosive decomposition of sodium azide , quickly inflates in front of the driver or passenger , preventing injury to the head. Side air bags, including the back seat passengers, also prevent injury.
secondary_definitions: A similar inflated bag used in performing stunts , etc.
( slang ) A person who talks too much; a windbag or gossip .
